item.title: Murder staged as accident, 10 held
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad Headlines Today â€” The Biggest Updates You Need to Know.
Hyderabad: Jogulamba Gadwal police have arrested 10 people, including alleged mastermind Millu Veeranna, for the Nov 21 killing of former Nandinne sarpanch Boya Chinna Bhimarayudu, a murder they say was staged as a road accident. Police seized Rs 8.5 lakh in cash, four cars, two bikes, a car, 11 mobile phones and 13 SIM cards.Bhimarayudu, 45, died after his motorcycle was hit by a car near Jampalli bus stand on Raichur Road. "Thr...]]>
item.author: Tnn
